result.execSummary:
The defendant LaDonna L McNair #245821 was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Penalty - Retail Theft (>$500 - $5000)], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: Consecutive to present sentence.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.
Complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Restitution Stipulation filed.
Filed by Atty. Peter Masana

Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant plead no contest to count one. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence withheld, 2 yrs. probation, consecutive to present sentence, $518 costs, $650 restitution, joint and several, complete AODA and comply with all treatment recommendations. No jail credit.

Defendant LaDonna L McNair #245821 in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.
